     908          47 : void ControlManager::onInit() {

     912             : //}
     913             : 
     914             : /* preinitialize() //{ */
     915             : 
     916          47 : void ControlManager::preinitialize(void) {
     917             :

    2495             : /* //{ timerSafety() */
    2496             : 
    2497      131846 : void ControlManager::timerSafety(const ros::TimerEvent& event) {
    2498             : 
    2499      131846 :   mrs_lib::AtomicScopeFlag unset_running(running_safety_timer_);
    2500             : 
    2501      131846 :   if (!is_initialized_) {
    2502           0 :     return;
    2503             :   }
    2504             : 
    2505      263692 :   mrs_lib::Routine    profiler_routine = profiler_.createRoutine("timerSafety", _safety_timer_rate_, 0.05, event);

    2507             : 
    2508             :   // copy member variables
    2509      131846 :   auto last_control_output   = mrs_lib::get_mutexed(mutex_last_control_output_, last_control_output_);
    2510      131846 :   auto last_tracker_cmd      = mrs_lib::get_mutexed(mutex_last_tracker_cmd_, last_tracker_cmd_);

    2886             :

    2900           0 :     return;
    2901             :   }
    2902             :

    2905         369 :   if (!throttle) {
    2906           0 :     ROS_ERROR_THROTTLE(1.0, "[ControlManager]: TODO: implement landing detection mechanism for the current control modality");

    2909             :

    2911             :

    2913             :

    2917             :     // |                            TODO                            |
    2918             :     // This section needs work. The throttle landing detection      |
    2919             :     // mechanism should be extracted and other mechanisms, such     |
    2920             :     // as velocity-based detection should be used for high          |
    2921             :     // modalities                                                   |
    2922             :     // --------------------------------------------------------------
    2923             : 
    2924         369 :     if (!last_control_output.control_output) {
    2925           0 :       ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(1.0, "[ControlManager]: timerEland: last_control_output has not been initialized, returning");

    2927           0 :       return;
    2928             :     }
    2929             :

    2948             :

    3389             : /* asyncControl() //{ */
    3390             : 
    3391       57868 : void ControlManager::asyncControl(void) {
    3392             : 
    3393       57868 :   if (!is_initialized_) {
    3394           0 :     return;
    3395             :   }
    3396             : 
    3397      115736 :   mrs_lib::AtomicScopeFlag unset_running(running_async_control_);

    3401             : 
    3402             :   // copy member variables
    3403      115736 :   auto uav_state           = mrs_lib::get_mutexed(mutex_uav_state_, uav_state_);
    3404       57868 :   auto current_constraints = mrs_lib::get_mutexed(mutex_constraints_, current_constraints_);
    3405             : 
    3406       57868 :   if (!failsafe_triggered_) {  // when failsafe is triggered, updateControllers() and publish() is called in timerFailsafe()

    6921             : // | --------------------- obstacle bumper -------------------- |
    6922             : 
    6923             : /* bumperPushFromObstacle() //{ */
    6924             : 
    6925         551 : void ControlManager::bumperPushFromObstacle(void) {
    6926             : 
    6927             :   // | --------------- fabricate the min distances -------------- |
    6928             : 
    6929         551 :   double min_distance_horizontal = _bumper_horizontal_distance_;
    6930         551 :   double min_distance_vertical   = _bumper_vertical_distance_;
    6931             : 
    6932         551 :   if (_bumper_horizontal_derive_from_dynamics_ || _bumper_vertical_derive_from_dynamics_) {
    6933             : 
    6934         551 :     auto constraints = mrs_lib::get_mutexed(mutex_constraints_, current_constraints_);
    6935             : 
    6936         551 :     if (_bumper_horizontal_derive_from_dynamics_) {
    6937             :

    7182             : /* bumperGetSectorId() //{ */
    7183             : 
    7184         197 : int ControlManager::bumperGetSectorId(const double& x, const double& y, [[maybe_unused]] const double& z) {
    7185             : 
    7186             :   // copy member variables
    7187         197 :   mrs_msgs::ObstacleSectorsConstPtr bumper_data = sh_bumper_.getMsg();
    7188             : 
    7189             :   // heading of the point in drone frame
    7190         197 :   double point_heading_horizontal = atan2(y, x);
    7191             : 
    7192         197 :   point_heading_horizontal += TAU;
    7193             : 
    7194             :   // if point_heading_horizontal is greater then 2*M_PI mod it
    7195         197 :   if (fabs(point_heading_horizontal) >= TAU) {
    7196         197 :     point_heading_horizontal = fmod(point_heading_horizontal, TAU);
    7197             :   }
    7198             : 
    7199             :   // heading of the right edge of the first sector
    7200         197 :   double sector_size = TAU / double(bumper_data->n_horizontal_sectors);
    7201             : 
    7202             :   // calculate the idx
    7203         197 :   int idx = floor((point_heading_horizontal + (sector_size / 2.0)) / sector_size);
    7204             : 
    7205         197 :   if (idx > int(bumper_data->n_horizontal_sectors) - 1) {
    7206           0 :     idx -= bumper_data->n_horizontal_sectors;
    7207             :   }
    7208             : 
    7209         394 :   return idx;
    7210             : }
    7211             :
